languages.text: Ваш челнок сожжен и уже никогда не поднимется в воздух. Обугленное тело пилота застыло, вцепившись в рычаги.
Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.
languages.original_text: Ваш челнок сожжен и уже никогда не поднимется в воздух. Обугленное тело пилота застыло, вцепившись в рычаги.

traits.locale_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never take off again. The pilot's charred body is clenching the gears, motionless.
Your shuttle has been burned and will never take off again. The pilot's charred body is clenching the gears, motionless.
Your shuttle has been burned and could never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, the hands are clenching the levers.
Your shuttle has been burned and could never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, the hands are clenching the levers.
Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.
Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

languages.text: Dein Shuttle ist verbrannt und wird nie wieder fliegen. Die verkohlte Leiche auf dem Pilotensitz hält noch immer die Hebel umklammert.
languages.original_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

traits.locale_text: Dein Shuttle ist verbrannt und wird nie wieder fliegen. Die verkohlte Leiche auf dem Pilotensitz hält noch immer die Hebel umklammert.

languages.text: Votre navette a brûlé, elle ne pourra plus jamais voler. Le corps calciné de la pilote est rigide, ses mains serrant encore les leviers de commande.
languages.original_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

traits.locale_text: Votre navette a brûlé, elle ne pourra plus jamais voler. Le corps calciné de la pilote est rigide, ses mains serrant encore les leviers de commande.

languages.text: 你的穿梭机已经被彻底烧毁，再也无法起飞了。飞行员僵硬的尸体被烧焦了，双手还紧紧握着操纵杆。
languages.original_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

traits.locale_text: 你的穿梭机已经被彻底烧毁，再也无法起飞了。飞行员僵硬的尸体被烧焦了，双手还紧紧握着操纵杆。

languages.text: あなたのシャトルは焼けてしまい、二度と飛ぶことはできない。パイロットの黒焦げの体は硬直しており、手はレバーを握りしめ続けている。
languages.original_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

traits.locale_text: あなたのシャトルは焼けてしまって、二度と飛ぶことはできない。パイロットの黒焦げの体は硬直して、手はレバーを握りしめている。

languages.text: Tu lanzadera se ha quemado y no volverá a volar. El cuerpo carbonizado del piloto está rígido y sus manos aún sujetan la palanca.
languages.original_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

traits.locale_text: Tu lanzadera se ha quemado y no podrá volver a volar. El cuerpo carbonizado del piloto está rígido y sus manos están agarrando las palancas.

languages.text: Mekiğin yandı, bir daha uçabilecek durumda değil. Pilotun kömürleşmiş bedeni kaskatı kesilmiş, elleri kontrol kollarını hâlâ sıkıca kavrıyor.
languages.original_text: Your shuttle has been burned and will never fly again. The pilot's charred body is stiff, hands still clenching the levers.

traits.locale_text: Mekiğin yandı, bir daha uçabilecek durumda değil. Pilotun kömürleşmiş bedeni kaskatı kesilmiş, elleri kontrol kollarını hâlâ sıkıca kavrıyor.
